Name: California Speed
Description: A racing game with several different tracks set in California

Name: Cannonball
Description: An unreleased black and white game where the player tries to fire a human cannonball through an opening in a wall

Name: Canyon Bomber
Description: Players control blimps which fly over a canyon dropping bombs . Canyon boulders are worth different points . Black and white

Name: Centipede
Description: A big hit for Atari , the player controls the character at the bottom and shoots a segmented centipede as it advances down the screen through a field of mushrooms . Other enemies , such as spiders and fleas , also threaten the player

Name: Championship Sprint
Description: A racing game in which players attempt to beat each other around tracks while avoiding hazards

Name: Cloak & Dagger
Description: The player attempts to destroy Dr. Boom 's underground bomb factory . Featured in a film of the same name

Name: Cloud 9
Description: The player shoots down clouds in the sky that threaten to flood his chamber at the bottom of the screen

Name: Cops
Description: A laserdisc game based on the TV series of the same name ; players must shoot criminals or chase after them in their patrol car

Name: Cops N Robbers
Description: A black and white game ; players can choose to be cops and shoot at and stop robbers or vice versa

Name: Crash ' N Score
Description: A black and white demolition derby game where the object is to hit randomly appearing numbered pylons

Name: Crystal Castles
Description: A moderate success , the player controls a bear character to collect crystals along paths in various caves with avoiding enemies . The player can find and use various powerups and secrets

Name: Cyberball
Description: Robotic football of the future . Robots can explode with the ball if it reaches critical temperature . Players can upgrade robots from funds from successful plays

Name: Cyberstorm
Description: A futuristic one-on-one fighting game with robots
